items.name: QUERY
desc: The control should be filled with the results of a database query.

items.name: SQL
desc: The control should be filled with the results of a database statement.

items.name: SQLPASSTHROUGH
desc: The control should be filled with the results of a database statement, which is not evaluated by the database engine.

items.name: TABLE
desc: The control should be filled with the data of a table.

items.name: TABLEFIELDS
desc: The control should be filled with the field names of a database table.

items.name: VALUELIST
desc: The control should be filled with a list of string values.
